bonjour_h.intro_Txt: The Axis product includes support for Bonjour. When this is enabled, the product will automatically be detected by operating systems and clients that support this.
bonjour_h.settingsTxt1: The available settings for Bonjour are:
bonjour_h.settingsTxt3: Friendly name - This will be the name displayed for the product in the operating systems that support Bonjour. The friendly name currently used for this product is:
bonjour_h.settingsTxt4: Saving an empty friendly name will return it to the default, which is the product's name and serial number.
bonjour_h.help7Txt: Bonjour is a trademark of Apple Computer Inc.
